meanings.definition: A feeling of great happiness and exhilaration.
meanings.sent1: The elations of winning the game were evident on their faces.
meanings.sent2: She experienced elations when she received the good news.
meanings.sent3: The elations of finding a dollar on the street made her day.
meanings.sent4: His elations soared to the sky as he achieved his dream.
meanings.sent5: The elations of a child on a swing are pure and infectious.

meanings.definition: The act of making someone happy or proud.
meanings.sent1: Her elations were contagious and spread joy to everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: The elations of her success brought smiles to her family's faces.
meanings.sent3: His elations at the surprise party were heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: The elations of her kindness lifted the spirits of those around her.
meanings.sent5: The elations of a teacher seeing their students succeed are unmatched.
